TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Track extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一个处理 控件的定位和大小调整的控件基元和两个用于设置 的 控件。

span.span: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a control and two controls that are used to set a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不具有默认。The control does not have a default . 其作为的一部分实现的和控件。Its is implemented as part of the of the and controls. 具有控件和两个用于更改控件属性控件。The has a control and two controls that are used to change the property of the control. 下图显示滑块上。The following illustration shows a on a slider. **在滑块上跟踪****A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton、 Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 Thumb")![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") 下表显示属性和相应它们自动绑定到的属性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties that they automatically bind to. 当这两个属性更改时，绑定的属性也会更改。When either property changes, the bound property also changes. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 下表显示属性和相应属性时绑定到属于控件和属性未显式设置。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 下表显示属性和相应属性时绑定到属于控件和属性未显式设置。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 此外，属性控制与控件绑定属性控制的控件。Additionally, the properties for the controls for a control bind with the properties for the controls of the control. 当用于滚动内容的大小控件成正比的可视区域或视区中所示的内容的百分比。When a is used to scroll content, the size of the control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport. 下图显示的示例实现控件控件。The following illustration shows an example of a control that implements a control. **滚动条，具有跟踪的控件****A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar 图](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar 图")![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") 以下计算用于计算的大小。The following calculation is used to compute the size of the . thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLengththumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength ViewportSize 参数是值属性。The viewportSize parameter is the value of the property. 最大和最小参数都对应于和属性值。The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the and property values. 最大表达式的值-最小 + viewportSize 是可滚动的内容的大小。The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content. 请注意，值属性表示的内容滚动到底部时。Note that the value of the property represents the of the when the content is scrolled to the bottom. 这值是不相同形式的长度或范围的内容。This value is not the same as the length or extent of the content. 有关更多详细说明，请参见。For a more detailed explanation, see . 的中从顶部到底部或从左到右的方向根据递增。The of a in a increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 同样，的中增加从底部到顶部或从左到右的方向根据。Similarly, the of a in a increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 若要更改增加值的方向，设置属性到`true`。To change the direction of increasing value, set the property of the to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义中控制 。The following example shows how to define a control in a . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#TrackDefinition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#trackdefinition)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDirectionReversed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的增加方向是否与默认方向反向。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing is reversed from the default direction.

value.span: 如果 和 交换位置并且值增加的方向反向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the and the exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的值设置为`true`、和中交换位置。When the value of is set to `true`, the and the in the exchange places. 从左到右的这两个水平的值增加和控件。 values increase from left to right for both horizontal and controls. 但是，对于垂直值而增加从上到下，对于垂直这些值增加从底部到顶部。However, the values for a vertical increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical these values increase from bottom to top. 当你将设置属性`true`，增加值的方向将反转。When you set the property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses. 如果你实现作为的一部分控件并且你未显式设置属性，属性将绑定到属性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何属性定义内控件模板时属性是。The following example shows how the property is defined inside the control template when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Maximum { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的最大可能 。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible of the .
The largest allowable for the .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件处于控件和属性未显式设置，此属性自动绑定具有属性。When a control is in a control and the property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the property. 值控件是相当于减去可见的内容区域或视区的大小的可滚动内容的大小。The value for a control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport. 例如，如果内容的大小为 100，然后的大小属性为 30 的值属性为 70。For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the property is 30, the value of the property is 70. 这是 true 因为属性控件对应于在可滚动内容中，将显示在视区顶部的位置。This is true because the property of the control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport. 当内容滚动到底部在此示例中时，30%的内容仍将显示在视区中。When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport. 因此，相对应的视区顶部为 70，和值为 70。Therefore, the that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the value is 70. 下图显示了对应的位置的控件。The following illustration shows how the corresponds to a position in the of a control. ![值对应于内容的位置](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "值对应于内容的位置")![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性该按钮将变为的绑定源属性。The following example shows how to set the property for a that becomes the binding source for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ Thumb { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::Thumb ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取用于更改 的 的 控件。

span.span: Gets the control that is used to change the of a .

value.span: 与 一起使用的 控件。

span.span: The control that is used with the .

value.span: 默认值为具有默认设置的 控件。

span.span: The default is a control that has default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放置控件对应于的控件。The placement of the control corresponds to the of the control. 大小中控制控件会反映的是当前可见的内容量。The size of the control in a control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible. 大小控制通过以下方式计算：The size of the control of the is computed in the following ways: - 如果未指定属性的大小是固定的默认值。If the property is not specified, the size of the is a fixed default value. 这是如何的轨道函数内控件。This is how the of a Track functions inside a control. - 如果指定属性和内容的大小大于，使用以下公式：If the property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the , the following formula is used: ThumbSize = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / （最大值-最小值 + ViewportSize）ThumbSize = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize) 其中，如下所示定义参数：Where the parameters are defined as follows: ||| |-|-| |ThumbSizeThumbSize|大小作为 TrackLength 相同的单位中的控件。The size of the control in the same units as the TrackLength.| |TrackLengthTrackLength|长度。The length of the .| |ViewportSizeViewportSize|可滚动区域可见的内容的单位，如文档页面数的大小。The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.| |最大值Maximum|内容的单元，如 10 文档的某页 10 页中的内容最大值。The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.| |最低Minimum|内容的单元，如文档的第 1 页中的内容最小值。The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.| 下图显示了可视表示形式中的这些参数的某些控件。The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a control. ![视区大小、 滚动块大小和跟踪长度](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "视区大小、 滚动块大小和跟踪长度")![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length") - 如果内容的大小小于、不会出现与属性设置为`false`。If the size of the content is less than a , the does not appear and the property of is set to `false`. 最小大小为控件由两个系统参数，和。The minimum sizes for a control are determined by two system parameters, and . 最小大小中垂直控件为 1/2 *和的最小大小中水平控件为 1/2 * 。The minimum size for a control in a vertical is 1/2 * and the minimum size for a control in a horizontal is 1/2 * . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何样式定义内时属性是。The following example shows how the style is defined inside the when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可见的可滚动内容部分的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.

value.span: 可滚动内容的可见区域的大小。

span.span: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它表示未定义内容的大小。

span.span: The default is , which means that the content size is not defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性用于计算的大小中控制时不。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control in a when the is not . 有关详细信息，请参阅备注属性。For more information, see the remarks for the property. 若要显式定义的大小，创建派生自对象类并提供替代和。To explicitly define the size of the , create an object that derives from the class and provide overrides for and . 如果你实现作为的一部分控件并且你未显式设置属性，属性将绑定到属性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. 值属性中实现的控制控件始终是，这是因为控件不会更改大小。The value of the property of a control that is implemented in a control is always , because the control does not change size. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
